lenders.name: AnnMarie
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance for a better life.

lenders.name: Jo and Miles
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.  We have so much and others have so little.

lenders.name: Stuart
lenders.loan_because: It is so easy to think of what you don't have, but just giving a little in a small way makes you appreciate more of what you do have. This is the best way to feel an individual difference on a large scale in this enormous interconnected world.

lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that shows people the world.  My job is about helping people see the wonders of North America.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help in some small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to prevent, diagnose and treat oral disease in people of all ages.

lenders.name: Margot

lenders.name: Peggy

lenders.occupational_info: I manage business and development for equipment used to make mobile voice and data calls.

lenders.name: Colleen

My job is to help run the movie theater and to set-up weddings/parties/concerts and to serve food and drink to the people there.  I am also going to college where I take courses that will prepare me for graduate school.  Ultimately, I am hoping to work as a physician's assistant.

lenders.name: Roy

lenders.name: Ian

lenders.occupational_info: My work? Not really what I would like to be doing for the week, but it does pay me. I'd much rather be riding my bike, travelling the globe, sitting with a book in one hand, a glass of wine in the other...

lenders.name: The Violet Crowns
lenders.loan_because: To honor our dear friend Mary who had a very generous heart.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: to be honest, it just feels so good to know that in some way maybe I can be of service to someone else as hundreds of people have helped me throughout my many ventures.
lenders.occupational_info:
When we decided to launch a company called Mental Messages in March 2004, we loved the name, and we had a vague idea that the company would have something to do with inspiration, motivation and personal development, but other than that, we had no grand plan.
Now with a little time into our exploration and evolution, and with the release of our magazine “mental messages” we have a clear idea of “what we want to be”, a company that focuses all of it’s efforts on sharing ideas, stories and resources that inspire people to explore and tap into their own vast pool of personal potential.
For us we truly can’t think of a better way to “make a living”.
Kim, Jennifer and Jay Jacobs

mental messages
"it all begins with the seed of an idea"

lenders.name: Cristina
lenders.loan_because: I can help someone to help themselves, and that way they can in turn help their communities and families and the next generation.

lenders.name: Lisa and Aaron
lenders.loan_because: This is our way to help others achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: Staci Lichterman

lenders.name: Norman Family

lenders.name: Shinjiro
lenders.loan_because: all human beings deserve better lives.
lenders.occupational_info:
I was born on Oct. 18th, 1967.
 I have spent most of my life in Osaka and Tokyo, Japan, but I have lived in Frankfurt, Chicago, and London with my wife.
I traveled many countries during twenty years including North America, South America, Asia, Europe, and Africa.
My experience told me that the world is worth living.

I am lucky enough to have a good job and I have almost nothing to worry about my life. 
So I think it is about time to start helping other people.
I seriously hope to have a world without poverty and war.

lenders.occupational_info: Je protege la nature des activités humaines (I protect nature from the activity of human)

Patricia helps raise awareness and educate others in her community about poverty, violence and homelessness in the U.S.

Spencer is an architect and builder working on small, smart remodels for friends and neighbors.

lenders.name: Brian & Kris

This summer, I'll be teaching HIV/AIDS prevention in Arusha, Tanzania, and running a psychological study in my free time there.

lenders.name: Craig

lenders.name: Hannah Family

lenders.name: Allen
lenders.loan_because: So little can have such a profound impact .

lenders.name: Robert Joseph Williams
lenders.loan_because: I read about this site in Bill Clinton's book 'Giving'. I hope that everyone who can will choose to help someone through this site with any donation possible. It is my duty to give back so that others may have a rewarding and fulfilled life. It is the very least I can do. 'The world is built on chesed.'
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked in a nuclear plant for almost 12 years. However, my real job is trying to be the best human being possible. I try but often fail, yet I continue to care deeply about those whose lives are a daily struggle. My wish is that everyone in the world have the chance to reach their potential and live a fulfilled and purposeful life. May it be so...

lenders.name: roberta
lenders.loan_because: It's a wonderful way I can help others . .. and I'm so impressed  with the spirit of the people.   I loan to honor them.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a mother and a retired teacher.  That's my beautiful daughter Hannah in my photo

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I know how difficult it is to strive, specially if you do not have anyone to turn to for help. Sometimes you just need that tiny additional push.
lenders.occupational_info:
My work is very technical (and solution-oriented) but a great deal of it has to do with direct contact with people: with colleagues, business partners, Customers. And that's my favorite part!
I do get to travel a lot, which is very tiring, but at the same time I feel very priviliged for being given the oportunity to see the world.

lenders.occupational_info: I help people with their personal and spiritual development. A great deal of my work is  with children and young people, particularly those that most vulnerable. I try to inspire and help people to open to their uniqueness and their unlimited potential.

lenders.occupational_info: I test and review Blue Cross & Blue Shield benefits before they are officially loaded to the system.

lenders.name: Rev. Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: It helps people become self sufficient and hopefully make their community stronger and more stable.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach math.

lenders.name: Oxi Brite Inc
lenders.occupational_info: Our company makes environmentally friendly cleaners .

lenders.name: Marz and Susanne
lenders.loan_because: ...it feels good to be a small part of a bigger picture.  If everyone in the world had this mentality, we could accomplish wondrous feats - like the abolishment of human suffering.
lenders.occupational_info: Our job is enjoyable and interesting.  We work with artist/entertainers who are passionate about what they do.  That's why we want to help people to live their dreams; seeking to calm their desire for more.

lenders.name: Pierre
lenders.loan_because: Hell, I got that bit of money on the bank account doing nothing, so it might as well help people that need it and have ideas rather than just profit my greedy banker. :)
lenders.occupational_info: behind the desk developing websites, sort of, waiting for the next opportunity to travel the world, meet new people, do a bit of good around me.

lenders.name: Pradeep
lenders.loan_because: I understand the nature and need of borrowers and I have been in there shoes several times in my life but was helpless.Ever since I heard about Kiva, I think it's a way to help the community.I will do my best in my will to give community any help I can afford.

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: I believe in every person's vision for themselves and their community.
lenders.occupational_info: Design models and implants to aid in patient specfic (custom) surgical procedures.

lenders.name: Per Kristian
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help the entrepreneurs build a sustainable income that can make their life better and help their local community thrive.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a programmer and develope mainly web based software solutions, like websites, portals and webshops.

lenders.name: Abhilash
lenders.loan_because: I love people who sweat and toil to earn their bread, instead of beg, in spite of severe hardships and poverty. And I wish to empower such people. With the dream that they, in turn, empower more people to work for their living.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an engineer and an oilman. I travel around the world and wish to contribute my tiny bit to the society wherever I go. Meanwhile, I spend some time encouraging social activism in my country, India.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: as a current graduate student getting my degree in the field of social work I feel a responsibility to help others in need. I believe in a Creator who gives us second chances...he's given me many more. Why not give to others the mercy and grace He's shown me.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: It is so easy and feels so good.  Also and obviously, because I want to help others who are in need.
lenders.occupational_info: My work currently involves simply living as an environmentally sensitive life as I can.  I am also working to uncomplicate my life, but that is difficult given my fascination with technology.

lenders.name: Roy Neil
lenders.loan_because: the Kiva program seems to be a way to link up with others around the world who enjoy work and want to live useful, productive lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach college writing and literature classes on a campus that is part of the state university system. I also write and publish papers, mostly on literary topics.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: It's a good idea.
lenders.occupational_info: Like the movie Office Space.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good.

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: I am a citizen of the world and it is my job to help a citizen in need, wherever they are.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the first manager of sustainability for Iron Moutain. I get to spend every day thinking about how my company can meet its business goals while also doing great things for our community and the environment!

lenders.name: Kristi-lee Gordon
lenders.loan_because: There are people in this world who need financial assistance more then I do. I have been fortunate in my life to be blessed with a safe home and a healthy family, and by loaning money to these people, I hope they can have a wonderful life as well.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I think everybody who has enough money should give at least a little bit to the poorer people in the world.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.occupational_info: I am part of an organisation that purchases and improves commerical and residential property throughout Europe by co-investing alongside local real estate companies.

lenders.name: Petra
lenders.loan_because:
I can.
I am thankful that I was born here and have all these opportunities so many people don't have. 
Our world is getting smaller by the day and I am happy to be able to help others who are less fortunate. 
I also strongly admire all entrepreneurs who work hard to make a living. 
Plus I hope the loans are some motivation, I know it would motivate me, if someone from across the world believed in me :-)
lenders.occupational_info:
I work in administration at a home for old people. 
I try to make everything run smoothly for the old people and their relatives. I like my work and my colleagues.

lenders.name: Kelsey
lenders.loan_because: I love seeing people reach their full potential.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell advertising space on popular American websites (one being Better Homes & Gardens, BHG.com).

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I care about people and want to help.  My thanks to Kiva for making it easy to help others:-)
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the Office of Diversity at a community college in Kansas.

lenders.name: Kayla
lenders.loan_because: It helps others get the footing they need to succeed.

lenders.name: ross
lenders.loan_because: To share, help, and knit the world into a better place for everyone
lenders.occupational_info: I start up companies, then manage and grow them, then move on to a next venture.

lenders.name: bendid
lenders.loan_because: I feel that Kiva and its field partner really enable and empower people to take life into their own hands in economic terms.
lenders.occupational_info: Since I work in bank myself, I feel that  access to capital for the right price is absolutely necessary for economic progress and activity. Transaction cost and institutional constrains make it difficult for large financial institutions to make micro loans. Hence, an organization like Kiva and its field partner are an important and revolutionary capital allocation and transmission link!

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: A modest amount (in our society) of financial  help can make a big difference to someone in another (less privileged) society.
lenders.occupational_info: Designing industrial printers.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: A little bit from lots people goes a long way!
lenders.occupational_info: I help other people take care of their money.

lenders.name: Hugo
lenders.loan_because: I find it truly amazing that the simple act of giving can provide poor people with optimistic plans for the future and help households cope with everyday life.

lenders.name: Ranjani
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is important to encourage and empower  individuals who are willing to work hard in persuit of their dreams.

lenders.name: katie
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to live  a decent life

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: I load because I can. My parents were born in Poland under communism and though we have all three grown up as studied, thoughtful, educated people, I am the one that has comparatively huge financial resources to share. I simply owe to others that which is not my wealth, but rather my good fortune.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the education field, but not directly in the classroom. There are teachers of children, there are principals who organize and support a whole school of teachers, and there are superintendents who give help and information to schools. My work is in research, helping these educators, mostly principals and superintendents, to make decisions with information about how students learn, and what types of programs work well for as many as 100,000 students at a time.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I have personally recognized that I am blessed more than I am worth. The only thing that makes me happy is giving in all the ways I can, in all the time I can, and as often as I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student who's personal goal in life is success for others. How that comes about I'm still in the process of figuring out.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I care and I want to help those in need and willing to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with their printing and marketing needs

lenders.name: Haruna
lenders.loan_because: i want to continue my education
lenders.occupational_info: teacher who want to complete his education and for any department.

lenders.occupational_info: I help people find their dream homes, first homes, and really help them feel like they are getting the best home for their family.

lenders.name: Leah
lenders.loan_because: there is no reason not to.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage and protect historical materials from around the world, for future generations to enjoy and study.

lenders.name: Maughan Family
lenders.occupation: A teacher, a stay-at-home mom, and 3 crazy kids
lenders.loan_because: we can.

lenders.name: Nicola
lenders.loan_because: I like to do my bit to help people who are doing a lot to help themselves.

lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people become financially independent and these loans are a big step in the right direction.

lenders.name: Coleen

lenders.occupational_info: I create healthy skincare products specially formulated for sensitive skin.  I love what I do, and all my efforts come from a place of love...so I pay it forward.

pizza

lenders.name: David

lenders.name: Shari, Denis and Barney

lenders.name: Chris

lenders.name: Ryan

lenders.name: lonn

lenders.name: Madhukar
lenders.loan_because: Nolan Bushnell said - "The critical ingredient is getting off your butt and doing something. It's as simple as that. A lot of people have ideas, but there are few who decide to do something about them now. Not tomorrow. Not next week. But today. The true entrepreneur is a doer, not a dreamer." Being a dreamer I am still in that phase where I have to get off my butt, I want to help those who are the doers and inspire them and myself by doing so.
lenders.occupational_info: I presently look after product management of electrical products, as a part of strategic marketing group of Electrical & Electronics Business division of an Indian multinational.

lenders.name: Alisha
lenders.loan_because: with opportunities like these people are able to do amazing things in the world and money should not be what holds them back.

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: We can, we should, we MUST, so we shall!
lenders.occupational_info: Entertainment is my business!

lenders.name: eric
lenders.loan_because:
It encourages financial independence through entrepreneurship. As pointed by another lender, Kiva is not just another charity. On top of the money, it delivers development planning, organizational and financial advices and best of all it gives dignity to the borrowers who can say at the end: I DID IT.

On the personal side, it's good to think you did something useful...without that much of an effort. Congratulations to the Kiva teams for this excellent initiative.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: Kiva helps people to help themselves and grow their businesses thereby helping them gain self respect

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I believe in microcredit.

lenders.name: Susie
lenders.loan_because: Where else can $25 do so much for another human being?
lenders.occupational_info: I have fun with numbers and excel.

lenders.name: Melanie

I can. 
And because it's more productive than buying glow in the dark alarm clocks and fish shaped door handles from ebay.

lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people in a small way to give  them the  opportunity to help themselves to make a better life.

lenders.name: Hitoshi
lenders.loan_because: I wishing that  World people find happiness

lenders.name: Susanne
lenders.loan_because: I am so fortunate that I can give to people who are in need. These loans can make a difference to their family lives.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: it seems like a good idea and would love to be able to help some one achieve a better quality of life doing what they are good at.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a hospital setting up the computers.  I try to set up systems as best I can.  I have a lot of freedom and choice at work to do what I want and expensive toys to play with.  I work with interesting people and enjoy my job

lenders.name: Harbor Springs Econ
lenders.loan_because: For an economics class project, students created their own class business; the profit earned from the businesses support entrepreneurs around the world in an effort to aid in the fight against poverty.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I  am a widow  who raised 3 sons. I understand life can be difficult.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell flowers for people to give on special occasions.

lenders.name: Bethaney
lenders.loan_because: It's important to me to contribute to wider society.  I particularly feel for Cambodia because I've seen first hand what lovely, warm people live there and how much they need.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in giving a hand up as we are all in this together.

My inspiration is the song "We Are the World" and we are!
lenders.occupational_info:
I am 100% entrepreneur. 

I've created many business' in my life time. I love to help people who want to bring their dreams to life.

I know what it's like not to have money and at the same time have a dream in my heart, all I needed was  some financial help to support my dream.

Now I am so happy to help others build their dreams.

lenders.name: Genevieve
lenders.loan_because: I believe in loans CAN change lives!

lenders.name: bob

lenders.loan_because: I am more than willing to help those who want to help themsevs

lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower responsible business owners in less fortunate countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an attorney, practicing in the areas of civil litigation, real estate, workers' compensation and municipal court.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to help people to help themselves in an unbureaucratic way.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a teacher at a German high school for children from the age of eleven to 19 years. I teach English, French and "ethics / moral" (having to do with philosophy, psychology and questions that concern our way of life).

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I like knowing that I CAN make a difference in the lives of others.  I am not just giving away money and hoping that it helps someone, but I am providing an opportunity to someone who is willing to invest time and effort to turn my money into something worthwhile, and then returning it to me so it can help someone else!  What a great idea!!!
lenders.occupational_info: In my full-time profession, I help small companies here in the US grow their business by investing my time and expertise in helping them develop effective sales channels, and I am compensated with a small percentage of the profits they make as a direct result.

lenders.name: Kathy Allen
lenders.loan_because: I believe in supporting people to do their best and that as much of our donations should go directly to the cause.
lenders.occupational_info: My company help charities and 'good cause' organisations raise their profile and money through marketing and PR campaigns.

lenders.name: The Davis Family
lenders.loan_because: There is an abundance in the world.  We see that others need it more than we do, and we want to help them get what they want.

lenders.name: christina
lenders.occupation: retail + event manager for a non-profit
lenders.loan_because: The thought of being able to help people change their lives makes me shiver.
lenders.occupational_info:
I manage a retail store that supports a non-profit writing lab. 826LA is a non-profit organization dedicated to supporting students ages 6 to 18 with their creative and expository writing skills, and to helping teachers inspire their students to write.

Our services are structured around our belief that great leaps in learning can happen with one-on-one attention, and that strong writing skills are fundamental to future success.

With this in mind, we provide drop-in tutoring, after-school workshops, in-schools tutoring, help for English language learners, and assistance with student publications.

All of our programs are challenging and enjoyable, and ultimately strengthen each student’s power to express ideas effectively, creatively, confidently, and in his or her individual voice.

lenders.name: Harish & Shireesha
lenders.loan_because: its my small way of making this world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I write computer software programs.

I believe in solidarity and generosity.
